pageContext.claim: “Obama said knock it off and yet Obama is talking to his second in charge and he's saying, "Tell Vladimir I'll talk to him after the election." I mean, look, in terms of meddling, Obama was told in September, just prior to the election, that Russia was trying to meddle in the election. He didn't do anything about it he didn't even say anything about it. He only brings it up after the election.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump implies that Russian actions only happened because Obama was negligent in some way and that it won't happen under his administration. Russian operatives have already attempted to hack Democratic campaigns in the midterm elections. Plus, Obama made several attempts to stop Russia's meddling including speaking directly to Putin in the fall of 2016.
